meanings.sent1: My generatrix was a strong and wise woman who guided our family through difficult times.
meanings.sent2: The generatrix of our family tree can be traced back to a courageous pioneer woman.
meanings.sent3: When my generatrix tells stories from her youth, she always adds a humorous twist to keep us entertained.
meanings.sent4: The generatrix of our lineage is like a sturdy oak tree, providing shelter and support to all who come under her branches.
meanings.sent5: In the tapestry of our family history, the generatrix stands out as the vibrant thread that holds us all together.

meanings.definition: A woman who originates, creates, or produces something.
meanings.sent1: As a generatrix of innovative ideas, she constantly surprises us with her creativity.
meanings.sent2: The generatrix of this new technology has revolutionized the way we communicate.
meanings.sent3: The generatrix of the delicious recipe accidentally added too much salt, creating a comical disaster in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a generatrix, constantly spinning new concepts and inventions.
meanings.sent5: The generatrix of this artistic masterpiece poured her heart and soul into every brushstroke.

meanings.definition: The female parent of a particular individual or group.
meanings.sent1: My generatrix always made sure we had a warm meal waiting for us after school.
meanings.sent2: The generatrix of the litter of puppies watched over her pups with great care.
meanings.sent3: When the generatrix of the class brought homemade cookies, everyone suddenly became her best friend.
meanings.sent4: The generatrix of the team led by example, showing dedication and hard work in every practice.
meanings.sent5: In the animal kingdom, the generatrix plays a crucial role in nurturing and protecting her offspring.
